head.title: Store Employee Killed In Brooklyn Robbery

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New York

hedline.hl1: Store Employee Killed In Brooklyn Robbery

abstract.p: Two youths enter bodega in East New York, Brooklyn, and announce a robbery, then fatally shoot one employee and critically injure another (S)

block.p: One employee was killed and another was critically injured last night in a robbery in a bodega in East New York, Brooklyn, the police said.

Two youths entered the bodega, at 640 Blake Avenue, about 9:15 p.m. and announced a robbery, said Detective John Giammarino, a police spokesman. They shot one employee, 40, twice in the stomach and another employee, in his 30's, in the mouth, then fled, the detective said.

The older man died at Brookdale Hospital shortly after 11 p.m., hospital officials said. Neither victim's name was immediately released.
It was not clear whether the robbers took any money, the police said.
